section.title: purchase orders list of open List Open Purchase Orders
section.para: The Open Purchase Orders screen displays both unreleased and open (i.e., unvouchered) Purchase Orders. From this screen you may create new or edit existing Purchase Orders. To see the list of unreleased and open Purchase Orders, select the "List Open Purchase Orders" option. The following screen will appear:

note.para: Unreleased Purchase Orders are considered to be a valid source of supply by the planning systems.

section.para: When viewing the list of open Purchase Orders, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify which Purchase Orders you want to display in the list:
Select to include unreleased Purchase Orders in the list.
Select to include open (i.e., unvouchered) Purchase Orders in the list.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.

Highlight a Purchase Order and then select this button to print a copy of the selected Purchase Order. If the Vendor specified on the Purchase Order has an EDI Profile attached, you may encounter an EDI processing interface when printing the Purchase Order.

tip.para: You may select multiple Purchase Orders for printing or releasing by highlighting them using your mouse—or a combination of your mouse and either the SHIFT or CTRL keys.

listitem.para: Opens screen for creating a new Purchase Order.

Enables you to edit highlighted Purchase Order. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Purchase Order—except that when editing, the fields will contain Purchase Order information. Double-clicking on a Purchase Order will also bring you to the editing screen.

tip.para: You can edit posted Purchase Orders if you select the "Show All Unvouchered POs" option, which displays all posted POs which have not yet been vouchered.

listitem.para: Highlight a Purchase Order and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Purchase Order and then select this button to remove the Purchase Order from the list.
Highlight a Purchase Order and then select this button to release the selected Purchase Order.
